name: Project for Erasmus internship: Spinlet mechanism for water sensor positioning
description: This prototype consists in a spinlet motor that makes the function of moving the sensor up and down, and measuring the water quality in different positions. For this project, we made use of an Arduino protoboard to communicate with the spinlet and configure the moving function. We have also used Raspberry to communicate itself to the Arduino protoboard with Python and making the serial communication from there thanks to it.
